pages.text: Mortar is a wet mixture of earthy materials that is used to bind stones together. It is made by throwing Dry Mortar into water.
A very simple mixture to be made in a pinch.
Preparing the lime into quicklime via the $(l:machines/beehive_oven)Beehive Oven$() increases efficiency.

Sand particles can be replaced by pozzolan which is derived from crushing $(l:exploration/stones#pumice)Pumice$() and $(l:exploration/stones#scoria)Scoria$() in the $(l:machines/piston_crusher)Piston Crusher$().
